title: Colouring notations for plans: The plans shall be coloured as specified in Table 2 hereunder
clause_text: Colouring notations for plans: The plans shall be coloured as specified in Table 2 hereunder. The prints of the plans shall be on one side of the paper only.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Colouring notations for plans: The plans shall be coloured as specified in Table 2 hereunder. The prints of the plans shall be on one side of the paper only.
